title.en: A Prayer to the Dharma King Tri Songdetsen

text.en: Oṃ svasti!
text.en-trans: om svasti

text.en: Through the drum of the renowned Three Jewels,
text.en-trans: tashi kün gyi nang né chokgyur pa

text.en: The most perfectly sublime among all that is auspicious,
text.en-trans: rinchen sum zhé drakpé ngadra dé

text.en: Let joy and well-being reign throughout the whole of space and time,
text.en-trans: chok dü küntu dé gé khyabpa dang

text.en: And theuḍumbaraof virtue and excellence herald bounteous fortune!
text.en-trans: gelek udum waré shi gyur chik

text.en: Divine heir to the dharma kings of the supreme Śākya line,
text.en-trans: shakyé rik chok chögyal lha yi sé

text.en: Youthful Mañjuśrī in whom an affinity for Mahāyāna was awakened,
text.en-trans: tekchen rik sé jampal zhönnü ku

text.en: You who came to the land of Tibet as a guardian of the teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: lar yang böyul ten drö gön du jön

text.en: Tri Songdeutsen, at your feet I pray.
text.en-trans: trisong detsen zhab la solwa deb

text.en: With great difficulty and hardship, you invited translators and scholars,
text.en-trans: kawa dumé lo pen chendrang shing

text.en: Supervised the construction of a temple and established a basis for the teachings.
text.en-trans: tsuklak zheng né tenpé zhima tsuk

text.en: You fostered the ten virtues and arranged for the translation of sūtra and mantra—
text.en-trans: gé chü trim ché do ngak damchö gyur

text.en: Tsangpa Lhayi Metok, to you I pray.1
text.en-trans: tsangpa lha yi metok solwa deb

text.en: You transformed the land of Tibet from an island of darkness to a beacon of light,
text.en-trans: böyul münpé ling di karpor gyur

text.en: And received from Guru Padmasambhava in particular
text.en-trans: khyepar guru pema jungné lé

text.en: A vast ocean of Secret Mantra, including the Eight Commands—2
text.en-trans: kagyé lasok sang ngak gyatso nyé

text.en: Great prevailer over appearance and existence, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: nangsi wanggyur chenpor solwa deb

text.en: In your perfect wisdom, you are indivisible from Mañjughoṣa,
text.en-trans: khyenrab jampal yang dang nyisumé

text.en: In your great love, you are none other than noble Padmapāṇi,
text.en-trans: tsé chen pakchok chak na pemo ngö

text.en: And in your power, you are the mighty vajra-wielding Lord of Secrets—
text.en-trans: tutob sangdak dorjé dzinpa ché

text.en: Sovereign manifestation of the three buddha families, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: rik sum trulpé gyalpor solwa deb

text.en: Your heirs, infused with the blessings of your three secrets,
text.en-trans: gang gi sang sum jin gyi labpé sé

text.en: Including the five successive emanations of the Dharma king,
text.en-trans: chögyal rim jön namtrul nga trak sok

text.en: Have appeared and will continue to appear throughout the land—
text.en-trans: ta ü küntu jön dang jön gyur nam

text.en: Master of emanation and absorption, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tro dang duwé jepor solwa deb

text.en: Even now, during these increasingly degenerate times,
text.en-trans: danta ché cher nyikmé dü dir yang

text.en: The fact that the teachings endure is due to your kindness.
text.en-trans: tenpa rinchen nepa khyö kyi drin

text.en: Without ever losing sight of this and with firm conviction,
text.en-trans: ngepa nyi lé zhendu mi sempé

text.en: I pray to you, confidently and from the depths of my heart.
text.en-trans: yiché depé solwa nying né deb

text.en: May I incite the strength of your great compassion
text.en-trans: tukjé chenpö tsalshuk rab truk né

text.en: So as to overcome the dark forces of Māra’s legions,
text.en-trans: nakchok dü kyi dé tsok dulwa dang

text.en: And may I and others swiftly fulfil the noble aspirations
text.en-trans: khen lob chögyal sum gyi tukkyé nam

text.en: Formed by the abbot, the master and you, the Dharma king!
text.en-trans: dak sok drowé nyurdu drubpar shok

text.en: May all be auspicious so that throughout the course of all my lives,
text.en-trans: kyewa küntu jamyang chögyal gyi

text.en: I may be cared for by you, the Mañjughoṣa Dharmarāja,
text.en-trans: jezung khyen nü tsewar wangjor zhing

text.en: Acquire your wisdom, capacity and love, spontaneously accomplish my own and others’ aims,
text.en-trans: dön nyi lhündrub tartuk khyé nyi dang

text.en: And ultimately attain awakening inseparably from you!
text.en-trans: yermé ngönjang chubpé tashi shok
